Title: James Ellison Funeral
Plot: The funeral of a patriarch goes awry when the deceased's mistress arrives to pay her last repects. Kyle is mesmerized by the possibility of learning the blues from a real bluesman.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual content that may offend
GuestStars: Loretta Devine, Tamala Jones, Arden Myrin, Lee Weaver
